name: Glaceon

passive.name: Crystal Genome
passive.effect: Attacks from Pokemon that evolve from Eevee are not affected by Weakness, Resistance, or other abilities on your opponent's Pokemon.

attacks.name: Chilling Out
attacks.effect: You may generate up to 3 Ice energy and attach them to your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.

flavor: A scientist wanted her Eevee to live forever and cryogenically froze it. Eevee reacted to this experiment in a very unexpected way.
